Rulings.Base: 1. This card's level-changing effect is a Trigger effect. You determine what Level "Mirror Ladybug" will become when its effect resolves. It does not change continuously.\n2. If you control no other face-up monsters when this card's effect resolves, its Level does not change.\n3. If cards like "Skill Drain" or "Forbidden Chalice" affect "Mirror Ladybug" after its effect has resolved, its Level will return to 1 and will not change back even when the effect of "Mirror Ladybug" is no longer negated.
